channel.title: Mike Wallace
channel.description: Recent news about Mike Wallace, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Come out to the @IBLBandits game at Nelson tomorrow at 2 and see me pitch! Well the first one anyways. I'm practising my 4 seam fastball.
